item.title: iot city traffic sim
item.description: Studies show about 30% of fatalities and 40% of serious injuries occur at intersections. Working with a major IOT platform provider in the US, we developed powerful smart city traffic simulation, which includes IOT sensors. Our smart city IOT simulation capabilities provides rich, dynamic, reliable IOT sensor events which can be used to demonstrate (and to build/test) capabilities of IOT roll-outs.

item.title: big data
item.description: Conventional or “normal” business applications rely on structured data with predetermined links between data sets from different systems. For example, customer details in your ecommerce system is linked, via a customer ID field, with customer details in you CRM. But what about web client and web server click stream data of users who may not be customers? These and other systems produce data which is valuable when harvested intelligently and cost-effectively.

item.title: Business Web Apps
item.description: While “Big Data” gets all the hype, innovative internet-powered web and mobile applications continue to deliver huge business value in almost all business sectors. Innovative custom-developed cloud-based business apps are reducing costs and increasing revenues by enabling customers, partners and employees to collaborate more efficiently or reduce friction in sales & service interactions.

item.title: system improvement
item.description: In addition to building whole new systems or system sub-components, we can smoothly increase the speed and agility of your end-to-end delivery process by enhancing your new/existing systems’ performance analytics, automated integration, deployment and testing capabilities.
